Articles.Content:
Space shuttle

I have been working on this project for a while. Was very happy once i got the cargo doors working but that surprisingly was the easy part. The take off style i wanted to do took the most work. It can be fiddly but worth it once you get it working its worth it. It has a medium docking port as that's the main universal port for ship docking with stations and has enough fuel to either drop off cargo in orbit and return or do a meet up but it will need fuel to return after a meet up unless your really good with RCS.

Edited January 15, 2014 by Legendmir
That's amazing how you made the cargo bay doors. The whole thing is awesome, so nice work!
thanks means allot. put allot of effort in to this.
Thank you. my friend works as a video editor so when i showed it to him the best i got was 'its alright.' XD which i guess is pretty good as i don't do it for a living.
That's pretty awesome. I must try that my self.
Its not easy so dont expect a working one first time. Its a project youll have to come back to once in a while as you get more ideas.

Thats awesome! The only other shuttle with working bay doors was the on in EJ_SA's Twitch.tv show in Kerbalcon

Great job
I remember that. It was about 2000 parts. Im surprised his computer didn't give up on him.
